/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of a clear blue sky. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the urban landscape. Tall buildings, their facades a mix of red and orange hues, rise majestically on either side of the street, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, their colors muted against the vibrant backdrop of the cityscape. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. Despite the absence of any discernible text or specific landmarks, the image paints a vivid picture of a day in the life of a city.
